title: Inkdeath
description: Ever since the extraordinary events of 'Inkspell', when the story of 'Inkheart' magically drew Meggie, Mo and Dustfinger back into its pages, life in the Inkworld has been far from easy. With Dustfinger dead, and the evil Adderhead now in control, the story in which they are all caught has taken an unhappy turn.
author: Cornelia Funke
